content: I seemed to have messed up http://gb2.clinfhir.com/#id1616707963764 somehow (named VCI-01 near the bottom). Is there a way to delete it? I would download and fix it, but it does not download, and no graph is showing in the Library.

Yeah - does seem a bit munted. I haven't done a delete option yet, so will raise that as a priority! Just out of interest, when did you create the project - recently, or is it an older one updated recently?

@Paul Denning - OK have provided a delete option in the library (just sets a deleted status on the server actually). Also added a checkbox to filter the view to just your projects to help find it! Do need better filtering options in the library, but that should help for now...
Thanks. I think I first saved it 25 March.
Hmm. I wondered if the issue was an older graph but I guess it's not that. Let me know if it happens again...

Oops - I should have commented that out as I don't think it's working yet. The idea is that you will be able to paste resources (in XML or Json formats) and import them into a graph. It uses the goFsh functionally that your kind colleagues have provided to me via an API...
